Uses of Class
escpos.Style

  • Packages that use Style 
    Package Description
    escpos  

    • Uses of Style in escpos

      Methods in escpos that return Style 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Style EscPos.getStyle()
      Get actual style of this object.
      Style Style.resetLineSpacing()
      Reset line spacing to printer default used on ESC 2
      Style Style.setBold(boolean bold)
      Set emphasized mode on/off
      Style Style.setColorMode(Style.ColorMode colorMode)
      set color mode background / foreground reverse.
      Style Style.setFontName(Style.FontName fontName)
      Set character font name.
      Style Style.setFontSize(Style.FontSize fontWidth, Style.FontSize fontHeight)
      set font size
      Style Style.setJustification(EscPosConst.Justification justification)
      Set Justification for text.
      Style Style.setLineSpacing(int lineSpacing)
      Set line spacing.
      Style Style.setUnderline(Style.Underline underline)
      Set underline mode.
      Methods in escpos with parameters of type Style 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EscPos EscPos.feed(Style style, int nLines)
      Prints the data in the print buffer and feeds n lines.
      EscPos EscPos.setStyle(Style style)
      Set style of actual instance.
      EscPos EscPos.write(Style style, java.lang.String text)
      Write String to outputStream.
      EscPos EscPos.writeLF(Style style, java.lang.String text)
      Calls write and feed on end.
      Constructors in escpos with parameters of type Style 
      Constructor and Description
      Style(Style another)
      creates Style object with another Style instance values.
